casebody.data:
Mary MCDEVITT
v.
STAPLES, LLC ; Ryder Truck Rental Inc.; and Thomas Mills, Petition of: Staples, LLC and Thomas Mills No. 93 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. September 18, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 18th day of September, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
